pages.text: Appears in:$(li)OOO, Den-O, All Riders: Let's Go Kamen Riders (2011, movie)$(br2)Used to craft Shocker OOO's $(l:ooo/devices/shocker_ooodriver)OOO Driver (Shocker OOO)$(/l)$(br2)Used to access OOO's $(l:ooo/riders/ooo#tamashiy)Tamashiy Combo$(/l)$(br2)Can also be used as a leg medal by sneaking
